All naked for me, ~name~-sama.~ This is how I prefer men anyway... naked, hard and blushing!
Your underwear is nice, ~name~-sama, but you don't need it either.
I have a position that needs filling, but I think you're overqualified!
Hahaha! Now, no covering up, ~name~-sama; I want to see my rewards. <3
That's better, ~name~-sama. Keep losing and show me the rest. <3
Is there a strip slide puzzle that I could be doing to make this go faster?
Well, you're the one that got all hard seeing me dressed like this. Jerk off, loser-sama!
No holding back, loser-sama! I can hear you panting.
Teeheehee! Strip, ~name~-sama! <3
You're all naked, ~name~-sama~. I said no covering up... uh oh, I guess the answer to my question was "turned on". <3
... Fine, you can stare at me while you do that...
Oh my, finally you have to take off something interesting!
Oh, I'm sorry, are we playing strip poker or try-to-stay-clothed poker?
You'll be naked soon enough! <3
... Fine, you can stare at me while you do that...
I see a blush, ~name~-sama~ I thought guys didn't mind being shirtless.
Mine are still bigger! Now I wonder, are you cold, or turned on by stripping in front of others? <3
Teeheehee! Strip, ~name~-sama! <3
You know what the punishment for losing is, ~name~-sama. Rub it for me, loser-sama!
Teeheehee! Strip, ~name~-sama! <3
Haha! It's bite-sized! Shame I just lost my apetite.
Wow! I'm sure it will get even bigger when you hit puberty!
You have to run out of tiny things to take off eventually.
Hahahaha! Look how much it shot out! Clean yourself off and sit with that thing on display while I enjoy my prize. <3
Aww, what cute little tits~ Now I wonder, are you cold, or turned on by stripping in front of others? <3
All nice and topless for me... now I wonder, are you cold, or turned on by stripping in front of others? <3
You have to run out of tiny things to take off eventually.
Not surprising. I know everything there is to know about strip games!
Oh my, finally you have to take off something interesting!
You have to run out of tiny things to take off eventually.
Good girl, loser-sama. You get to sit there naked and sticky with your legs spread, while I enjoy my winnings. <3
Hahaha! Now, no covering up, ~name~-sama; I want to see my rewards. <3
I didn't say you could slow down, loser-sama!
Oh, I'm sorry, are we playing strip poker or try-to-stay-clothed poker?
Hahaha! Now, no covering up, ~name~-sama; I want to see my rewards. <3
Hah... ahh... m-my legs are numb... I came so hard...
How could I lose? THIS IS UNFAIR!
Dawn-sama used Terrible Cards. It's not very effective.
Where did you learn to play so slowly? Were you raised by turtles or something?
Somebody accidentally set this D.Va to hard difficulty!
Skirtium leviosa! Well... it was worth a try!
If I had two more wishes, I'd use them on your top and your pants, Jasmine-hime!
Suspect is hatless! Repeat, hatless!
I'm wet, you're taking off your boots, and this is taking forever. Am I trapped in this Water Temple I keep hearing about?
Radical!
Wait, so you were showing your undershorts this whole time? Devious!
I wouldn't mind putting my head in those clouds, Penny-sama! <3
If getting excited about a video game character is wrong, then I don't wanna be right!
Wanna play Texas Hold'em? Because you're from Texas and I wanna hold'em! <3
I hope you came prepared to share those coconuts with everybody, ~name~-sama!
You should show those on your stream sometime, D.Va-sama. You might get a few more subscribers.
A new fantastic point of view! <3
Not as pointy as I expected.
Don't you just cover yourself, or I'll import you into Kisekae later and put make embarrassing poses for you!
Let's see your lane, Jane-sama!
I bet your valley doesn't have as much stardew as mine does!
I've always wanted to spank a princess, and that ass is very spankable!
I have to warn you, Asuna-sama: When you touch yourself in the game, I touch myself in real life.
Wait, what? No tail? I should've looked up your game before we started!
I am happy to report that the cake is not a lie!
Looks like a couple of boys just got up at the crack of Dawn!
Looks like a few boys just got up at the crack of Dawn!
You're so adorable that I could just eat you up! And I just might after the game...
You're being channelled, so this is technically Maya-chan's pussy, right?
Somebody distract Nagisa-sama while I sneak her panties into my purse! <3
Tifa-sama, let's just say that getting you naked wasn't my final fantasy!
... That's my fetish!
Remind me to thank whoever sent out the invitations. It's a normal, hot, naked guy!
Time for some Chapter 16.5!
Time to take the Party Escort Submission Position, Chell-sama!
Open that portal for us, Korra-sama!
Is it wrong that I want to see Caleb-sama doing Shazza-sama doggy style?
I should join a motorcycle gang. I've always wanted a Harley between my legs.
You're just begging for a little sign that says "Eat Me", Alice-sama!
If I ever die, I want to come back as a pair of ghostly hands. I won't need to be summoned.
Revy-sama, how does it feel to be making a sticky mess of yourself for a change?
Wait, was I meant to tell a weird story too?
Zelda-hime, see me after the game. I've got a "sword" that you can borrow. Plunge it in and you won't know where the time went!
Strip poker has too few dudes. Thanks for coming, Fred-sama!
I can't believe I lost to Little Miss Sorry over here!

text.content: Hey, thanks for choosing my epilogue!
You made the right choice, because I'm going to give you a behind-the-scenes tour of the audition process for the game!
Actually, there is no audition process...
But I tell everyone that there is so that they'll strip for me!
These girls are waiting for a chance to show their stuff.
And by "stuff", I mean nipples. <3
I haven't checked the paperwork for these new arrivals, so they're not cleared to strip here just yet.
Until then, let's just undress them with our eyes.
Eh, you're right... That's boring!
How about I click my fingers to magically take their tops off?
*snap*
Haha, look at those faces! I love this place.
Moving on, this is our section for male applicants.
Nathan-sama, have you seen any other guys recently?
Nope.
Oh. Sorry to hear that. It's cool if you want to practise touching yourself here.
Uhh...
Or there's a whole bunch of girls with their shirts off in the next room if you want to try getting lucky.
I have never seen a man move so fast.
These girls are practicing their stripping, hoping to get someone interested in writing their dialogue.
Say hi, girls.
Hello, Mistress!
Hey.
It's ~name~!
That's all they can say right now.
Oh, they're about to start! Let's watch!
Good work, girls!
There's something about watching someone take their clothes off that makes me so wet!
Say, this wasn't my original plan, but let's have some fun now that we're at the end of the tour.
My room is down the hall. If you wanted to choose any one of today's applicants and join me there, I'm sure that the three of us could learn a lot more about each other! <3
